name: Marvos' Adventure
description:
Keyboard Controls:

Move - WASD / Arrow-Key

A - J / Z

B - K / X

START - Enter

Select - Shift

Description:

you play as Marvos, a young boy who wakes up in a forest. you begin to notice people are weird in this place, some of them have an existential crisis?

it's a really short game I made to learn gb studio. hope you liked it :)

- Shaked (FunkyWay)
